title: Aleksandr Vasyutin
text:
Aleksandr Yuryevich Vasyutin (; born 4 March 1995) is a Russian <a href="association%20football">football</a> player who plays as a <a href="Goalkeeper%20%28association%20football%29">goalkeeper</a> for Swedish club <a href="Djurg%C3%A5rdens%20IF%20Fotboll">Djurgårdens IF</a> on loan from <a href="FC%20Zenit%20Saint%20Petersburg">Zenit Saint Petersburg</a>.
Club career.
In his first game for <a href="FC%20Lahti">FC Lahti</a> on 13 August 2016 against <a href="PK-35%20Vantaa%20%28men%29">PK-35 Vantaa</a>, he scored a last-minute equalizer for his team. He won FC Lahti's player of the year, FC Lahti fans' player of the year and Finnish league goalkeeper of the year awards in 2017.
He rejoined <a href="FC%20Lahti">FC Lahti</a> on a new loan in April 2018.
On 5 July 2018 he joined Norwegian club <a href="Sarpsborg%2008%20FF">Sarpsborg 08</a>, signing a 2.5-year contract.
On 23 July 2019, he returned to Zenit, signing a four-year contract. He made his first competitive appearance for Zenit's senior squad on 30 October 2019 in a <a href="2019%E2%80%9320%20Russian%20Cup">Russian Cup</a> game against <a href="FC%20Tom%20Tomsk">FC Tom Tomsk</a>. He made his <a href="Russian%20Premier%20League">Russian Premier League</a> debut for Zenit on 15 July 2020, when he started the game against <a href="FC%20Orenburg">FC Orenburg</a>.
On 11 February 2021, he joined Swedish club <a href="Djurg%C3%A5rdens%20IF%20Fotboll">Djurgårdens IF</a> on loan. The club had an option to make the transfer permanent after the loan period. On 10 January 2022, the loan was extended until the end of 2022.
